name: Rainy Day II - Demo 1.0
description:
Looks like it's gonna be one of thoses days... A day where the rain doesn't seems to stop.  It wouldn't be a problem if water wasn't lethal for you...

Rainy Day is back with a brand new engine! Jump glide and slide with your umbrella, and make sure water never touches you!

The new engine is still in development, so be sure to comment if you see any glitches. Your feedbacks are greatly appreciated!

Be sure to follow me and stay informed about the development of the full games : https://twitter.com/Le_Toulousaing
